contents.text: Welcome to Roofstock East Bay, where you can earn passive income by purchasing certified rental homes backed by our 30-day money-back guarantee.
To learn how to purchase inspected rental properties and start earning passive income, press 1.
To browse our available East Bay rental homes with tenants in place, press 1.
One moment please while we connect you to our property listings team.

navigationGoals: I want to quickly see available East Bay rental homes with tenants in place so I can evaluate passive income opportunities.
I want to browse East Bay rental homes with tenants and learn how to start earning passive income as a veteran investor.
I need to access your tenant-occupied East Bay rental inventory for evaluation.
I need help finding tenant‐occupied investment homes in the East Bay.
I’d like to browse currently tenant-occupied East Bay rental homes to evaluate potential investments.

contents.text: To speak with an investment specialist about your next property purchase, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to a Roofstock investment specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to speak directly with an investment specialist to discuss my next property purchase.
I’d like to speak with an investment specialist about veteran financing options for my next rental property purchase.
I'd like to schedule a call with an investment specialist to analyze ROI and cap rates for my next rental acquisition.
I’d like to speak with an investment specialist about buying my next rental property.
I want to speak with an investment specialist about selecting my next certified rental property.

contents.text: For support with your existing account or property management, press 2.
To review your current properties and tenant performance, press 1.
Thank you for holding. We are now connecting you to property management support.

navigationGoals: I’d like to review the performance and tenant status of my current managed properties.
I need to review the performance and tenant status of my existing rental properties under my account.
I want to review my portfolio's occupancy metrics and rent roll performance.
I want to check how my current rental properties and tenants are performing.
I need to review performance metrics and tenant occupancy for my existing managed properties.

contents.text: To get help with payments or billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our payments and billing department.

navigationGoals: I need help resolving a billing or payment question on my account.
I have a question about my rental payment deposits and billing statements for my portfolio.
I need help reconciling my latest management fee invoice and resolving a billing discrepancy.
I need assistance understanding and resolving a billing issue on my account.
I have a question about a recent billing charge on my rental income account.
